name: SmartHR Company Ltd.
description: Developer of a cloud human resources software designed to help automate social insurance and employment insurance procedures. The company's software lets users fill out an online form and then generate digital versions of pension, employment insurance, and other related documents that can be submitted to appropriate offices at the click of a button, enabling businesses to manage and streamline their human resources processes.
